Project Description
Electronic flight instruments controls to use in windows forms and WPF forms


I have been using small rc planes and helicopters, and I don't like the way the telemetry is displayed on the ground station. I would prefer some more realistic and fancy airliner MFD like way. I didn't see any other project like this, so I decided to start my own.

The programming language I will use is Visual Basic .net v4.5.

For begining I will make WPF form controls that wil indicate all Boeing 737-800 EFIS system:
  • PFD
  • MFD
  • EICAS
  • EICAM

PFD
The PFD (Primary Flight Display) mainly displays the ADI (Attitude Director Indicator) also know as the "Artificial Horizon", and speed and altitude tapes. When complete all of the will be fully functional.
